item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Malcolm McLaren – Malcolm McLaren's Paris in flac or wav
item.description:
Hi all,
I know this is a very hard to find item, but... I'm trying anyway.
I'm looking for Malcolm McLater's Paris single in flac or wav.
This:
https://www.discogs.com/it/release/...ring-Catherine-Deneuve-Malcolm-McLarens-Paris
1 Paris Paris (Radio Edit) 4:22
2 Paris Paris (Youth—The Emotional Curvatone At A Given Moment In Space And Time) 17:15
3 Paris Paris (Youth—A Brief History Of Space) 4:19
4 Paris Paris (Secret Knowledge—Sonic Bidet Mix) 7:15

or this release, than includes the Youth mixes, but it's under a different name
https://www.discogs.com/it/release/222583-Secret-Knowledge-V-Youth-The-McLaren-Mixes
A1 Sonic Bidet Mix 7:47
A2 Lingerie Noir Mix 7:31
B1 The Emotional Curvatone At A Given Moment In Space And Time 17:15
B2 A Brief History Of Space 4:14

Thanks A LOT !
item.author: Angel_0
